text: Perlenbach may refer to: *Perlenbach (Rur), a river of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, tributary of the Rur **Perlenbach Valley, the valley of the Perlenbach **Perlenbach-Fuhrtsbachtal, a nature reserve *Perlenbach (Schwesnitz), a river of Bavaria, Germany, headstream of the Schwesnitz
title: Perlenbach
